name: How To Fly on a Classic Soviet Airliner for Less than £30!
description:
Is it possible to fly on a classic Antonov An-24 for less than £30 and in less than one day?  I took a trip to Ukraine to find out!

Airlines featured:
Motor Sich Airlines: www.flymotorsich.com/en/
LOT Polish Airlines
Wizz Air

Find the cheapest fares: http://infl.it/momondo

Hotel:
Royal Congress Hotel, Kiev: http://infl.it/royalcongresshotel
